Name: Capacity Management
Description: Ability to view current and future occupancy for the day so you can manage capacity and guest flow.

Name: Functionality for 2-Seater Karts
Description: Not sure what it would be exactly. Weather allowing both racers to share a kart number  or a merged account, or something else, but looking for someway to better function with the 2-Seater karts. Open for any suggestions to make work with what the software already has as well.Suggested by: Justin Baustert

Name: Discount System Overhaul
Description: Revamp the discount system in the POS to allow more granular control over the number of discounts used  the customers that can use them, the days or products they can be used on, total discount limits, etc.

Name: ClubDirector: Instructor Calendar
Description: Ability for instructors to set their availability and view their bookings in Club Director.

Name: Booking Manager
Description: Ability to create  view and easily manage all online bookings in Club Director.Search for bookingsReschedule Issue refundsModify bookings
